title: Brew Like a Pro - Make Pub-Style Draft Beer at Home
description:
Brew Like a Pro: Make Pub-Style Draft Beer at Home
By Dave Miller


Are you ready to take your homebrewing to the next level? In Brew Like a Pro, the legendary Dave Miller reveals the secrets of truly great draft- and pub-style brewing. He includes complete plans for a professional-quality home system that requires just 18 square feet of space, and he offers recipes for small batches of classic, all-grain brews that stay fresh in kegs for months, eliminating the need for bottling.
